data.title: All of the Celebrity Weddings in 2022
data.meta_description: Want to know which celebrities got married in 2022? We round up all the details from the wedding days of the stars.
data.text:
Rahul Mandal

Rahul Mandal, the 2018 winner of The Great British Baking Show, was married on December 5, 2022, in Kolkata, India. The baker shared the big news the day before his wedding took place. "I have an announcement to make,‚Äù he writes. "I‚Äôm getting married tomorrow. We both are very excited and a little nervous. I know you all will have a lot of questions. And me and my wife will answer them all. If you want to know anything about her, we will also be very happy to answer it, too.‚Äù Although Mandal doesn't reveal his wife's name, he assures his followers that he will post more details from his nuptials in the upcoming days.

Gabourey Sidibe and Brandon Frankel

After keeping it a secret for over a year, Gabourey Sidibe and Brandon Frankel announced that they're married. In an appearance on Live With Kelly and Ryan on December 5, 2022, the actress revealed that she and the entertainment professional tied the knot. After she shared the news, Frankel took to Instagram to provide more context. ‚ÄúSURPRISE,‚Äù he exclaims in the post. ‚ÄúI can finally call her my WIFE publicly! Since @gabby3shabby finally spilled the beans today on Live with Kelly and Ryan- we‚Äôve been MARRIED since March ‚Äò21! Relieved we can finally tell the world. So thankful to have found my forever person, my partner-in-crime, and the love of my life. Every day is the best day with you. Nobody I would rather raise cats with and be in bed by a smooth 8pm with. Love you forever üíöü´∂üèΩüòçü•∞üë∞üèøü§µüèª.‚Äù

Mitchell Tenpenny and Meghan Patrick

Country music stars Mitchell Tenpenny and Meghan Patrick said "I do" on October 23, 2022, in a rustic farm wedding in Tennessee, People confirmed. From a custom altar that the bride made with her father to a cake topper that the bride‚Äôs grandparents used at their wedding, the couple‚Äôs nuptials were filled with personal touches.

It was also a highly fashionable day, with the couple and their wedding party donning looks that followed the country-inspired theme. While the bride completed her lace Rue de Seine gown with snakeskin Lucchese boots, the groom rounded off his olive green jacket and jeans with a cream cowboy hat from Boot Barn.

Mary Lambert and Wyatt Paige Hermansen

"Same Love" singer Mary Lambert said "I do" to Wyatt Paige Hermansen on October 22, 2022, at Enchanted Gables in Oakland, Maine, according to People. The musician and her professor partner, who uses they/them pronouns, swapped vows in an outdoor autumn-inspired ceremony before celebrating at a rustic barn reception.

From writing their own vows to replacing the traditional wedding party with "broomsbabes and bridesbabes," the couple hosted a celebration that authentically captured their love story. ‚ÄúWe didn't want it to look like anybody else's wedding," Lambert told People. "We really want it to be us. We wanted to be the wedding that people look at and say, 'I want to do that.'"

Robert Kraft and Dana Blumberg

New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft said "I do" to Dana Blumberg on October 14, 2022 in a surprise ceremony at the Hall des Lumi√®res in New York City, according to People. The couple invited about 250 guests to a "Kickoff and a Touchdown" party without specifying that it was going to be their wedding celebration.

source told People that Elton John announced the pair as husband and wife, and Meek Mill and Ed Sheeran performed a song. According to Page Six, Tom Brady, Jon Bon Jovi, Kenny Chesney, NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell, and NBA Commissioner Adam Silver made an appearance.

Rita Ora and Taika Waititi

Rita Ora is no longer a single woman! The "For You" singer said "I do" to Taika Waititi during a private ceremony in London, The Sun UK reported on Monday, August 8, 2022. ‚ÄúIt was a really intimate ceremony and super special for everyone there,‚Äù a source told the publication. ‚ÄúTheir nearest and dearest can see how madly in love they are.‚Äù Even though the duo opted for a small wedding, they plan on hosting a larger celebration in the future, according to the source. We're so happy for them!

Jillian Michaels and DeShanna Marie Minuto

Jillian Michaels is a married woman! The fitness trainer married DeShanna Marie Minuto during an intimate ceremony in Namibia, Africa, People confirms. Before jetting off the the southern African country, the couple held a courthouse ceremony in Miami on July 11, 2022. Now, they plan on hosting their official wedding celebration on June 23, 2023 in Venice, Italy.

"DeShanna Marie Michaels, it‚Äôs an honor and an adventure saying ‚ÄòI do‚Äô to you,‚Äù Michaels told People she said to Minuto. ‚ÄúFinding you, my person, and eloping in Africa together has been one of the most magical and transformative chapters of my life." We're so happy for them!

Jay Ellis and Nina Senicar

After five years together, Jay Ellis and Nina Senicar are married! The Top Gun: Maverick star and Serbian actress tied the knot at a romantic ceremony in Tuscany, Italy on July 9, 2022, as reported by Vogue. ‚ÄúJuly 9th, 2022‚Ä¶Per sempre üíô,‚Äù they each captioned their Instagram posts.

The duo both donned custom Dolce and Gabbana looks: the Insecure actor in a maroon double-breasted tuxedo and the model in a strapless ball gown with a thigh-high slit and corset top. The couple‚Äôs 2-year-old daughter, Nora Grace, was the flower girl. And several of Ellis‚Äôs co-stars, such as Issa Rae, Glen Powell, and Nik Domain, watched the pair say ‚ÄúI do‚Äù amidst the picturesque vineyards. We‚Äôre so happy for them!

Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck

Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck are officially newlyweds! The stars tied the knot in a small ceremony at The Little White Wedding Chapel in Las Vegas at 12:30 a.m. on Sunday, July 17, 2022. The Marry Me actress shared all of the details on her newsletter, On The JLo. ‚ÄúWe did it,‚Äù Lopez wrote in her newsletter. ‚ÄúLove is beautiful. Love is kind. And it turns out love is patient. Twenty years patient. Exactly what we wanted.‚Äù

After obtaining their marriage license from Clark County, Nevada, the singer and actress took pictures in a pink Cadillac convertible before reading their vows and exchanging wedding rings. For the special occasion, JLo wore a timeless A-line dress, which she said she‚Äôs owned for years. She then changed into a Zuhair Murad off-the-shoulder lace gown with long sleeves. The groom sported a white tuxedo from his closet.

"They were right when they said, ‚ÄòAll you need is love.' We are so grateful to have that in abundance, a new wonderful family of five amazing children, and a life that we have never had more reason to look forward to," she shared in her newsletter. We couldn‚Äôt be happier for them!

Lindsay Lohan and Bader Shammas

Lindsay Lohan is now a married woman! The Mean Girls star said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù to forever with Bader Shammas. The actress took to Instagram on July 2, 2022 to share the news. She wrote, "üéÇ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞I am the luckiest woman in the world. You found me and knew that I wanted to find happiness and grace, all at the same time. I am stunned that you are my husband. My life and my everything. ‚ù§Ô∏èevery woman should feel like this everyday üôèüíñ"

The couple has been together since November 2020. After just one year of dating, Shammas proposed with a stunning diamond sparkler. We‚Äôre beyond thrilled for them!

Alexandra Daddario and Andrew Form

Alexandra Daddario and Andrew Form are officially a married couple! The White Lotus actress and the producer of A Quiet Place tied the knot in June 2022 in New Orleans. During a short ceremony at Preservation Hall, the duo exchanged vows and shed a few tears. The bride rocked a custom Danielle Frankel wedding dress with pleats and floral accents while the groom sported a pinstripe suit by Brunello Cucinelli. Form‚Äôs children stood by the couple‚Äôs side as groomsmen and ring bearers. After they were pronounced husband and wife, the duo celebrated at Bar Marilou for their reception.

‚ÄúWe were trying to achieve a laid-back aesthetic,‚Äù Alexandra Daddario explains to Vogue. ‚ÄúWe loved the look of Preservation Hall‚Äîit was so old, so historic. It lets its age and ‚Äòflaws‚Äô show. That‚Äôs what makes it so beautiful. We wanted it to be about music, drinking, and authentic New Orleans.‚Äù Congratulations to the happy couple!

Adrian Grenier and Jordan Roemmele

Actor Adrian Grenier has said "I do!" The Entourage star married Jordan Roemmele in a romantic elopement ceremony in Morocco. The couple, who have been linked since 2017, both wore white to spur of the moment ceremony. "It wasn't planned," Grenier told People. "We eloped in the Atlas Mountains while on vacation with friends in Morocco. We embraced the serendipity of the moment and made the decision to tie the knot‚Äîliterally, we didn't have rings so used string for rings."

"We were with a group of incredible friends, all of whom immediately rallied behind us and embraced the spontaneity of the moment," The Devil Wears Prada actor shared. The couple's friend, musician RY X, got ordained on his phone and officiated the ceremony. He even concluded the night with a song for the couple.

"They put in so much love and effort to create a wedding from thin air," noted the actor to People. "We couldn't have planned a better wedding if we tried!" We are sending our best wishes to the happy couple!

Bill Nye and Liza Mundy

Bill Nye the Science Guy found another avid learner to share the rest of his life with! The engineer secretly wed author and journalist Liza Mundy at the end of May 2022 during a private ceremony in Washington D.C., according to People. Their nuptials took place at the Castle Building‚Äôs Haupt Garden at the Smithsonian Institute.

With personalized vows and Star Trek star Robert Picardo officiating, their ceremony was truly one-of-a-kind. After saying ‚ÄúI do,‚Äù the educated couple listened to toasts from family members and shared a first dance to Sam Cooke‚Äôs rendition of ‚ÄúWhat a Wonderful World.‚Äù During the reception, Mundy also topped off her satin mermaid dress with sparkly sneakers. We‚Äôre so excited for the happy couple!

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are married‚Äîagain! The reality TV personality and her drummer husband made their marriage official for the third time on Sunday, May 22 in Portofino, Italy. All of their family and friends attended the international ceremony.

For their luxe nuptials, The Kardashians star sported a custom Dolce & Gabbana corseted mini dress with lace detailing. Tulle gloves, lace heels, and a cathedral-length veil embellished with the Virgin Mary completed her look. The Blink-182 drummer donned a black double-breasted suit by the same designer. Before being pronounced husband and wife, the duo recited their vows at a romantic altar decorated with red roses and white votive candles.

After locking lips, the newlyweds shared joint posts with the caption ‚Äúhappily ever after‚Äù on Instagram.

A reception at Castello Brown, which featured live music performances and food stations of pasta and cannolis, followed the ceremony.

Kardashian and Barker‚Äôs extravagant Italian wedding is the duo‚Äôs third time tying the knot. On April 4, the Poosh founder and the drummer had a ‚Äúpractice‚Äù wedding at a Las Vegas chapel, which an Elvis impersonator officiated. Then, on May 15, the pair held their legal ceremony at a Santa Barbara courthouse. We couldn‚Äôt be happier for them!

Chlo√´ Sevigny and Sini≈°a Maƒçkoviƒá

Chlo√´ Sevigny and Sini≈°a Maƒçkoviƒá are married‚Äîagain! The Oscar-nominated actress and the director of Karma Art Gallery first tied the knot on March 9, 2020 at New York City Hall. But, on May 15, they hosted another celebration in Connecticut with friends and family.

Sevigny turned heads in a dramatic Jean Paul Gaultier Couture one-shoulder dress with tulle fabric and sheer detailing while holding a long-stemmed bouquet of white calla lilies. Meanwhile, her now-husband donned a classic black suit. Later in the evening, she sported an outfit change, a long-sleeve gauzy dress and flowers in her hair.

YouTube‚Äôs head of fashion and beauty, Derek Blasberg, revealed some of the day's details on Instagram. ‚ÄúThis was the official celebration, complete with multiple bridal looks, ice sculptures, and a perfect, simple ceremony that mentioned her loyalty, his twinkly eyes, and both of their dance moves,‚Äù he wrote.

Sevigny and Maƒçkoviƒá share 2-year-old son Vanja together, whom they welcomed into the world just two months after their 2020 wedding. Congratulations to the happy couple!

JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers

JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers have finally tied the knot! The couple said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù in front of family members and close friends at the Sunstone Winery in Santa Ynez, California on May 14. ‚ÄúIt sounds clich√©, but I really am marrying my best friend,‚Äù The Bachelorette former lead tells People. ‚ÄúEverything that‚Äôs happened in our relationship has only made us stronger, and we just feel so lucky.‚Äù

The day started with Fletcher waltzing down the aisle in an Ines Di Santo gown before exchanging personal vows with Rodgers. Other Bachelor Nation alums, such as Becca Tilley, Raven Gates, and Adam Gottschalk, watched the couple while they made their marriage official.

At the black-tie reception, designed by Gianna SanFilippo and produced by Leila Lewis of Be Inspired PR, everyone savored on Italian dinner of pasta, steak, and fish outdoors. ‚ÄúWe wanted the vibe of our wedding to be traditional in a sense but also playful and fun and unique,‚Äù the reality TV star tells People. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve been planning for a long time, so we wanted it to be just right.‚Äù

The duo first met during Fletcher‚Äôs 2016 season of The Bachelorette, and by the end of the season, Rodgers proposed. The two started planning their wedding in 2019, but once the pandemic emerged, they decided to postpone. We‚Äôre so thrilled they‚Äôre now husband and wife!

Frankie Grande and Hale Leon

Frankie Grande is now married! The reality star said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù to his partner Hale Leon on May 4 during an intimate, galactic ceremony at his family‚Äôs home in Florida. ‚ÄúIt was the most beautiful ceremony, officiated by my incredible mother, and it brought us even closer together as we took our vows before our immediate families and before God,‚Äù he shared on Instagram.

The duo tapped Dolce & Gabbana to design tuxedos for their special day. After the wedding, they celebrated with a joint bachelor party weekend filled with games before setting off on their minimoon. But, it‚Äôs just the beginning of the wedding festivities for the newlyweds. The actor revealed that he is hosting a "wedding ball" with all of his friends in the next few months.

Grande ended his marriage announcement in the sweetest way. ‚ÄúLet me just say I am the happiest I‚Äôve ever been‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm married to the man of my dreams, our families have merged together so beautifully, and we are well on our way to happily ever after. I love you Hale Grande. I am so so honored to be your husband.‚Äù

Jack White and Olivia Jean

Fans thought they were attending Jack White‚Äôs concert on April 8, but they ended up experiencing much more than a musical performance! While singing a duet of ‚ÄúHotel Yorba‚Äù by the White Stripes onstage at the Masonic Temple in Detroit, the musician popped the question to girlfriend Olivia Jean. As if the proposal wasn‚Äôt enough, the duo proceeded to hold an impromptu ceremony just minutes after the engagement. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been such a great day, mind if we get married right now?‚Äù White asked the crowd at his concert.

The singer also posted the news on Instagram. ‚Äú‚ÄòLet‚Äôs get married in a big cathedral by a priest.‚Äô 04.08.22,‚Äù he wrote, referencing the ‚ÄúHotel Yorba‚Äù lyrics. We couldn‚Äôt imagine a more special day!

Brooklyn Beckham and Nicola Peltz

Brooklyn Beckham and Nicola Peltz are officially newlyweds! The couple tied the knot on Saturday April 9 during an extravagant black-tie event at the bride‚Äôs family estate in Palm Beach, Florida.

The actress waltzed down the aisle with water and floating flowers on either side while wearing Valentino, People confirms. During a traditional Jewish ceremony, the duo swapped personalized vows underneath a chuppah draped with orchids. Nearly 600 guests, including Victoria and David Beckham, Serena and Venus Williams, Jordana Brewster, Gordon Ramsay, and Eva Longoria, attended the wedding.

After the ceremony, guests sipped beverages and watched David Blaine‚Äôs magic show during the cocktail hour. The elaborate reception, held in one of three oceanfront tents, consisted of Peltz sporting an outfit change, Marc Anthony performing four songs on a rotating stage, and David Beckham delivering a heartfelt speech about family, People reports.

The pair got engaged in July 2020, just six months after their relationship went public. We‚Äôre wishing them a lifetime of happiness!

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker

Surprise! Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker have tied the knot! On Monday April 4 at 2 a.m., just hours after Travis performed at the Grammy Awards, the power couple said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù at a wedding chapel in Las Vegas. An Elvis impersonator officiated the ceremony, and the duo showed up with their own photographer and security. Since the couple was in Las Vegas for the Grammys, they saw it as the perfect opportunity to get hitched, according to TMZ. However, due to not securing a Nevada marriage license, the couple are not officially married yet.

Kourtney revealed the exciting news on Instagram, along with a series of photos she found in her camera roll. She captioned the post, "Once upon a time in a land far, far away (Las Vegas) at 2am, after an epic night and a little tequila, a queen and her handsome king ventured out to the only open chapel with an Elvis and got married (with no license). Practice makes perfect."

The pair has been engaged since October 2021, and they started dating just nine months before that. We‚Äôre expecting more wedding celebrations to come!

Jon Batiste and Suleika Jaouad

Five-time Grammy winner Jon Batiste is married! The musician revealed on April 3 that he said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù to Suleika Jaouad in February. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve been secretly married until this moment,‚Äù he shared on CBS This Morning.

After his partner of eight years was diagnosed with leukemia for a second time, the pair decided to tie the knot the night before her bone marrow transplant. "He said to me, 'I just want to be very clear, I'm not proposing to you because of this diagnosis,‚Äô‚Äù Jaouad recounted to E! News. ‚Äú‚ÄòIt's taken me a year to design your ring. So, just know this timing has nothing to do with it. But what I do want you to know is that this diagnosis doesn't change anything. It just makes it all the clearer to me that I want to commit to this and for us to be together.‚Äô But once we realized we had this tiny window before the bone marrow transplant, we decided to go for it."

When they swapped vows, the New York Times bestselling author was wearing a hospital gown in an operating room. Although it wasn‚Äôt the wedding they envisioned, they couldn‚Äôt imagine a more meaningful moment. ‚ÄúThere were maybe four people present‚Äù she told E! News. ‚ÄúIt was private. It was tiny. And it was perfect.‚Äù

Since the singer wasn‚Äôt present for his wife‚Äôs transplant, he wrote her a lullaby. "The darkness will try to overtake you," he said. "But just turn on the light. Focus on the light. Hold on to the light."

Billie Lourd and Austen Rydell

Billie Lourd is married! The American Horror Story star made her relationship official with Austen Rydell on Saturday during an intimate sunset beach wedding in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, according to Vogue. The duo hosted a wedding weekend full of fun and festivities, beginning with a private pool party on Friday afternoon, People confirms. The actress revealed the big news on Instagram, along with the caption, ‚Äú‚ú®3Ô∏è‚É£‚ú®1Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£‚ú®2Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£‚ú®,‚Äù her wedding date.

For the ceremony, the bride wore a custom off-the-shoulder tulle dress by Rodarte, Vogue confirms. ‚ÄúI discovered Kate and Laura after they interviewed my mom for an article in 2014 and immediately fell in love,‚Äù Billie tells Vogue. ‚ÄúSo, when I started thinking about who I wanted to design my wedding dress, they were the first people that came to mind. I have always been a massive fan of their work and thought their elegant, ethereal, unique style was a perfect fit for my kind of elegant, ethereal, unique personality.‚Äù Meanwhile, Rydell sported a classic Tom Ford tuxedo.

The couple has been engaged since June 2020, and they share 1-year-old son Kingston Fisher together. We couldn‚Äôt be more thrilled for them!

Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Matthews

Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Matthews are officially married! The Kansas City Chiefs quarterback and his high school sweetheart tied the knot on Saturday in Maui, Hawaii during a seaside ceremony with friends and family, according to People. The NFL star sported a gray suit with sparkly black shoes, while his bride donned a custom Versace gown with striking cutouts, sparkly embellishments, and a billowing train.

The couple shared the exciting news on Instagram with a joint post, which featured a collection of photos and the caption, ‚ÄúMr. & Mrs. Mahomes ü§ç.‚Äù A very special guest, their 1-year-old daughter, Sterling Skye, also made an appearance!

The quarterback, who led the Chiefs to their Super Bowl LIV win, and his longtime partner have been engaged since Sept. 1, 2020. Mahomes popped the question with an emerald-cut diamond ring on Matthews‚Äôs 25th birthday and the same day the Chiefs received their Super Bowl rings. The duo met at Whitehouse High School in Whitehouse, Texas and have been dating since they were sophomores in high school. Congratulations to the happy couple!

Danielle Brooks and Dennis Gelin

Danielle Brooks kicks off the year with a Miami wedding dripping with grandeur and elegance. The Orange is the New Black star wed her fianc√© Dennis Gelin in January with friends and family by their side. With the recent outbreak of Omicron, the couple required attendees of their lavish wedding, planned by D‚ÄôConcierge, to have a both a negative PCR and rapid test.

But COVID didn't stop the actress from having her dream wedding‚Äîshe wore not one, but two exquisite gowns. Brooks walked down the aisle in a custom dress from London-based Black designer Alonuko. She gave fans a peek at the stunning gown with a gallery of images, taken by Reem Photography, that she posted on her Instagram.

For the reveal and reception, Brooks slipped into a dress designed by longtime friend Cristian Siriano. "We thought it would be best to do a first look reveal so that we could go ahead with bridal party pictures and not hold up our guests after the ceremony," she told Vogue. "I decided to wear Christian Siriano for the reveal. We have been friends ever since my career first began."

The couple also had one very special guest in attendance: their two-year-old daughter served as their flower girl in the ceremony. Congratulations to the happy family!
